item.title: Improve your coding experience: More 10 VS Code extensions to try
item.description: One of the reasons VS Code is so popular is because of its extensibility. It allows us to install extentions that can do basicaly anything and improve our productivity and workflow. In this post, I’ll increase the list of extensions from my previous post and show more 10 extensions that are worth trying.
item.postDescription: One of the reasons VS Code is so popular is because of its extensibility. It allows us to install extentions that can do basicaly anything and improve our productivity and workflow. In this post, I’ll increase the list of extensions from my previous post and show more 10 extensions that are worth trying.

item.title: VS Code extensions worth trying out
item.description: Visual Studio Code is the most used IDE according to the Stack Overflow 2022’s Developer Survey and it has lots of extensions to help us be more productive. Even developers who use another main IDE probably use VS Code for some part of their jobs. In this post I’ll show some of the extensions that I use to work, study and write this blog.
